tachyon.master

Class LocalTachyonMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.LocalTachyonMaster

  • public final class LocalTachyonMaster
extends Object
    Constructs an isolated master. Primary users of this class are the LocalTachyonCluster and LocalTachyonClusterMultiMaster. Isolated is defined as having its own root directory, and port.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static LocalTachyonMaster create(TachyonConf tachyonConf)
                                 throws IOException
        Creates a new local tachyon master with a isolated home and port.
        Throws:
        IOException - unable to do file operation or listen on port

      • create

        public static LocalTachyonMaster create(String tachyonHome,
                        TachyonConf tachyonConf)
                                 throws IOException
        Creates a new local tachyon master with a isolated port. tachyonHome is expected to be clean before calling this method.

        Clean is defined as 

         UnderFileSystems.deleteDir(tachyonHome);
   UnderFileSystems.mkdirIfNotExists(tachyonHome);
        Throws:
        IOException - unable to do file operation or listen on port

      • start

        public void start()

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Stops the master and cleans up client connections. This method will not clean up UnderFileSystemUtils data. To do that you must call cleanupUnderfs().
        Throws:
        Exception
